overview:
Yetty Ogunnubi is a fashion designer and artist. She is the CEO and founder of Revolution by Yetty D Label and Yettyd. Design Inc.

Yetty studied business administration in the university. Due to her love for art and fashion, she founded Yettyd. Design Inc in May 2007. Yetty D Apparels are unique with a combination of Afro/Urban fashion with western flavour. Her styles are inspired by contemporary art and hip hop fashion.

Yetty has participated in many fashion shows since 2007. She also hosts her own annual fashion show themed Yetty D Fashion Show.

Yetty is also a partner in Paint-And-Wear.com which organises children parties, She is also a events feature editor for The Bulb Ideas Group and She is also a producer and mentor for a up coming reality TV Show Uber Africa Unmasked

Due to her creativity and hard work, Yetunde was chosen as an ambassador to a charity organization “Do Something Positive for Africa”.

Yetty has been interviewed on several websites including thecreativeafricans.com because of her hard work and inspiration to other upcoming African youths.
